cs.LG, cs.AR, cs.CV, cs.NE, cs.SY. 

The paper discusses the training of Deep Neural Networks (DNNs) using reduced-precision representations, which is a topic that falls under the category of Machine Learning (cs.LG) and Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI). The paper also mentions the use of chunk-based accumulation and floating point stochastic rounding, which are techniques commonly used in Computer Vision (cs.CV) and Robotics (cs.RO). Additionally, the paper discusses the potential for improved hardware training platforms, which falls under the category of Systems and Control (cs.SY). Finally, the paper mentions the use of reduced-precision representations for back-propagation, which is a topic that falls under the category of Numerical Analysis (cs.NE).
